lyrics.text:
Ko e ‘Eiki Tauhi
Ko Sīsū Kalaisi,
Na’a ne lava’i
Ma’a ‘ene kakai
‘A e ma’a foaki ni,
Pea ‘oku tuku ki ai.

Pea tafe hifo,
Ki he kakai tui,
‘A e lolo tapu,
Pea tafe ma’u pē,
‘O a’u ki he si’i hifo,
‘Oku tui ki he Lami.

‘Io ki he tapa,
‘O hono fu’u kofu.
Ko e kau feinga,
‘Oku fie ‘ofa
Ki he Lami toto’ia,
‘Oku anga’ofa ia.

‘Oku tau ongo’i
‘Ene fakafo’ou,
‘A hotau tokoni,
‘O hokohoko fai
‘Oku pongipongi hake,
Pea efiafi foki.

Ko e hahau lelei,
Fakaakeake;
‘Oku ngangana mai,
Ki hotau Saione,
‘Oku tokonaki ia,
Ma’a e kakai kotoa pē.

’Oku lilingi ni,
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
‘A e tapuaki,
Mei ‘olunga na;
Ko e ‘uha fakatupu,
‘A e ‘ofa, ‘i he loto.
